name: Fesnia
description: Two Mages; Orbi and Jole, must fight their way through dangerous lands and end up on the other side in one piece. Will you be able to guide them to safety?
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better Display
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better Display
